result.title: pkgdev: Helpers to Develop a Package using GitHub Actions
result.value:

cff-version: 1.2.0
message: 'To cite package "pkgdev" in publications use:'
type: software
license: MIT
title: 'pkgdev: Helpers to Develop a Package using GitHub Actions'
version: 0.1.0.9060
abstract: A small set of functions that takes advantage of GitHub Actions for making
  your life easier as a R package developer. This package is primarily intended for
  personal use, however feel free to use it (at your own risk :)).
authors:
- family-names: Hernangómez
  given-names: Diego
  email: diego.hernangomezherrero@gmail.com

All contributions to this project are gratefully acknowledged using the [`allcontributors` package](https://github.com/ropensci/allcontributors) following the [allcontributors](https://allcontributors.org) specification. Contributions of any kind are welcome!

dieghernan
A small set of functions that takes advantage of Github Actions for making your life easier as a R package developer. This package is primarily intended for personal use, however feel free to use it.

A small set of functions that takes advantage of GitHub
    Actions for making your life easier as a R package developer. This
    package is primarily intended for personal use, however feel free to
    use it (at your own risk :)).

A small set of functions that takes advantage of GitHub Actions for making your life easier as a R package developer. This package is primarily intended for personal use, however feel free to use it (at your own risk :)).

**pkgdev** is a small package that includes a set of functions that
takes advantage of [GitHub Actions
(GHA)](https://github.com/features/actions) for making your life easier
as a R package developer. This package is primarily intended for
personal use, however feel free to use it (at your own risk :wink:).

You can install the developing version of `pkgdev` with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("dieghernan/pkgdev")
```

Alternatively, you can install `pkgdev` using the
[r-universe](https://dieghernan.r-universe.dev/pkgdev):

``` r
# Install pkgdev in R:
install.packages("pkgdev", repos = c(
  "https://dieghernan.r-universe.dev",
  "https://cloud.r-project.org"
))
```
developer-tools, experimental, github-actions, r, r-package, rstats

pkgdev: Helpers to Develop a Package using GitHub Actions
